subject: Water Skiing
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A water skiing competition this week on Lake Silverado in Adna, Wash., features the three standard disciplines: slalom, tricks and jumping. But at this event, the competitors ski without skis.
snippet: A water skiing competition this week on Lake Silverado in Adna, Wash., features the three standard disciplines: slalom, tricks and jumping. But at this event, the competitors ski without skis.
